sentences.en: A horde of children ran over the office building.
sentences.cn: 一大群孩子在办公大楼里到处奔跑.

sentences.en: A horde of children ran through the building.
sentences.cn: 一大群小孩从大楼里跑过去.

sentences.en: A horde of ragged women and children swarmed about the streets.
sentences.cn: 一大群衣衫褴褛的妇女和儿童在大街上四处游荡.

sentences.en: Before he sends his horde against the walls again.
sentences.cn: 要赶在他再派出游牧部落来进攻之前.

sentences.en: Death to the enemies of the Horde!
Feel the awesome might of the Feron horde.
He bulls through the press horde that encircles the car.
sentences.cn: 他用冲的穿过围绕汽车的重重人群.

sentences.en: Rise up, sons of the Horde! Blood and Glory await us!
sentences.cn: 起来, 部落之子! 鲜血与荣耀在等待我们!

sentences.en: The Alliance and Horde reach a temporary truce to defeat the Legion.
sentences.cn: 联盟与部落暂时休战以对抗燃烧军团.

sentences.en: The force there assembled was trivial compared with the Danish horde.
sentences.cn: 他调度的军队与丹麦的乌合之众相比是微不足道的.

sentences.en: This attracts hordes of tourists to Las Vegas.
sentences.cn: 这吸引了一群群的旅客来到拉斯维加斯。

sentences.en: Two women were quarrelling on the street, surrounded by horde of people.
sentences.cn: 有两个妇人在街上争吵, 被一大群人围住了.

sentences.en: Why should she feed this horde of hungry men?
sentences.cn: 她干吗要养活这群饿痨鬼 呢 ?

sentences.en: Will Horde & Alliance players be able to group together?
sentences.cn: 部落 与 联盟的玩家可不可以共同组队?

sentences.en: Will players have the ability to change factions ( from Horde to Alliance )
sentences.cn: 玩家可不可以更改阵营 ( 部落到联盟 )?

trans.tran_en: a large crowd moving in a noisy uncontrolled way
